name: Quinoa Pilaf with Red bell pepper, Leek, Carrot, Peas.
description: This quinoa pilaf is a quite neutral flavored(no sharp spice or herbs), so it can go well with any spread.
recipeIngredient: Add other veggies like celery, mushrooms, greens of choice ( quantities depending on the amount of cooked quinoa)
1/4 tsp chili flakes  (or chopped green chili)
roasted nuts, cashew or almond slivers, chopped cilantro (garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook  Quinoa according to instructions(I usually cook 1/2 cup quinoa it in a little more than 3/4 cups water, roughly 1.5 times water, for about 15 minutes). You can also toast the quinoa a little before adding water for a fluffier nuttier quinoa. Fluff it up as soon as cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan on medium heat, Oil, Leek, Carrots and Red bell pepper. Add other veggies like celery, mushrooms, greens of choice in quantities depending on the amount of cooked quinoa.
